Name: Trials of Argolis
About the game: The Game Trials of Argolis is a First-Person meele combat Bossrush set in Ancient Greece mixed with some fantasy elements. The Gameplay Trials of Argolis combines First-Person movement with fast paced melee combat requiring quick reflexes and well timed reactions, playing with a controller is recommended. After defeating a Boss you'll be rewarded with Trial-Medals which you can use to improve different physical attributes. There are 6 difficulty settings to choose from ranging from very forgiving to brutally difficult including a Perma-Death mode for the ultimate challenge. Your Opponents The game features 15 unique Bossfights inlcuding one secret fight. The fights require your full attention if you want to succeed but vary in difficulty. The Bosses do not need to be defeated in any particular order with a few exceptions. The Environments You'll visit four different environments over the duration of the game which also vary in time of day. After overcoming an opponent you are free to explore their sometimes quite expansive arenas. Please Note This game supports Mouse and Keyboard, Dualshock 4 Controller and Xbox One Controller. Support for any other controllers cannot be guaranteed.
